articles.content:
Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Havana from Raul Castro Ruz 
   Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Raul Castro Ruz, President of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Havana on September 10 on the occasion of the 60th birthday of the DPRK.

Congratulatory Visit Paid to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visit Paid to DPRK Embassy 
   Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The Chamberlain of the Presidency who is a special envoy of Muhammad Hosni Mubarak, president of the Arab Republic of Egypt, paid a congratulatory visit to the DPRK embassy in Cairo on Sept. 9 on the occasion of the 60th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
